snippet: Ms. Gardner founded the magazine in 2011. The publication, which glamorizes farming, has become one of the magazine industry’s biggest recent success stories.
abstract: Ann Marie Gardner, editor in chief of magazine Modern Farmer, tells employees she is stepping down; Frank Giustra will remain magazine's chief financial backer.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Gardner founded the magazine in 2011. The publication, which glamorizes farming, has become one of the magazine industry’s biggest recent success stories.

headline.main: Ann Marie Gardner Steps Down as Editor of Modern Farmer
headline.print_headline: Editor Leaves Hit Magazine on Glamour of Farming
